name: Samyam Dhamala
headline: Data Analyst • QA Engineer • Software/C++ Developer | MS Information Science
about: Versatile data and software professional with 3+ years across QA automation, data analysis/BI, IT support, and full-stack development. Experienced with Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, modern C++, and test automation tools like Cypress, Postman, and JMeter. Currently completing an MS in Information Science and enjoy turning messy data and complex systems into reliable, human-centered experiences.
